meanings.definition: The quality or state of being distinct.
meanings.sent1: The distinctnesses of the colors made it easy to identify each one.
meanings.sent2: The distinctnesses of the flavors in the dish were remarkable.
meanings.sent3: The distinctnesses of the animal sounds in the jungle added to the excitement of the adventure.
meanings.sent4: The distinctnesses of her laughter echoed through the room, filling it with joy.
meanings.sent5: The distinctnesses of the mountain peaks against the sky created a breathtaking view.

meanings.definition: The act of distinguishing or differentiating.
meanings.sent1: Her distinctnesses in recognizing faces impressed everyone around her.
meanings.sent2: The distinctnesses in his speech patterns made him stand out in the crowd.
meanings.sent3: The distinctnesses in her dance moves brought a smile to everyone's face.
meanings.sent4: The distinctnesses in his writing style set him apart as a unique voice in literature.
meanings.sent5: The distinctnesses in her problem-solving approach made her a valuable team member.

meanings.definition: A clear difference or separation between things.
meanings.sent1: The distinctnesses between the two twins were evident in their personalities.
meanings.sent2: The distinctnesses between the two paths helped him choose the right one.
meanings.sent3: The distinctnesses between the two recipes made it hard to decide which one to try first.
meanings.sent4: The distinctnesses between the two theories became clearer as the discussion went on.
meanings.sent5: The distinctnesses between the two paintings highlighted the artist's unique style.
